ResourceManagementAttribute.Value: This is an activity to reset a user's password.
This activity applies for approval from specific approvers by mail.
This Activity Generate Unique Account Name
Invokes a UNIFY Event Broker operation list.
This activity restricts which values are valid in filter expressions used in dynamic sets and groups.
This activity allows functions to be used in workflow definition.
This is a Lockout gate for Authentication workflows.
This activity sends notification to specific recipients.
This is a Password Gate for Authentication workflows at registration.
This is a Question and Answer gate for Authentication workflows.
This activity restricts a requestor's ability to add or remove members from groups they do not own.
This activity manages the application of Synchronization Rules to FIM objects.
Activity to ACL a file share
Activity to create a file share
Activity to create update and delete FIM resources
UNIFY-Create update and delete FIM resource activity
Activity to create and update FIM Groups
Write workflow data to a log file
Activity to lookup resource properties and write them to WorkflowData as strings
Distribution Groups (DGs) provide an easy way to send email to a group of users. When you send email to a DG, the email will be delivered to all its members.
Entitlements are user role assignments. AIMS automates global group membership based on current entitlements.
See requests you've made, or approve requests that others have made to you.
Security groups (SGs) are used to secure network resources. When permissions to a resource are assigned to a SG, all members of the group can access that resource.
Profiles allow you to see information about users in your organization.
All staff users at my CSO site(s)/school(s)
This resource configures the number of days Requests and Workflow Instances are to be retained before being available only through historical query.
Request and workflow instance retention period configuration

<!--DisplayName--> <my:Control my:Name="DisplayName" my:TypeName="UocTextBox" my:Caption="{Binding Source=schema, Path=DisplayName.DisplayName}" my:Description="{Binding Source=schema, Path=DisplayName.Description}" my:RightsLevel="{Binding Source=rights, Path=DisplayName}"> <!--my:Hint="Enter a unique value that contains only alphabets, space character or/and numbers.">--> <my:Properties> <!--Force this to be required.--> <my:Property my:Name="Required" my:Value="true" /> <my:Property my:Name="Columns" my:Value="30"/> <!--<my:Property my:Name="RegularExpression" my:Value="[A-Za-z0-9' ']*"/>--> <my:Property my:Name="MaxLength" my:Value="64" /> <my:Property my:Name="Text" my:Value="{Binding Source=object, Path=DisplayName, Mode=TwoWay}" /> </my:Properties> </my:Control> <!--End of DisplayName-->
<!--Description--> <my:Control my:Name="Description" my:TypeName="UocTextBox" my:Caption="{Binding Source=schema, Path=Description.DisplayName}" my:Description="{Binding Source=schema, Path=Description.Description}" my:RightsLevel="{Binding Source=rights, Path=Description}"> <my:Properties> <my:Property my:Name="Required" my:Value="{Binding Source=schema, Path=Description.Required}" /> <my:Property my:Name="RegularExpression" my:Value="{Binding Source=schema, Path=Description.StringRegex}" /> <my:Property my:Name="Text" my:Value="{Binding Source=object, Path=Description, Mode=TwoWay}" /> <my:Property my:Name="Rows" my:Value="4" /> <my:Property my:Name="Columns" my:Value="60" /> <my:Property my:Name="MaxLength" my:Value="448" /> </my:Properties> </my:Control> <!--End of Description-->

The RCDC stores the layout information for what types of controls to provide and how they map to the schema in the 'Configuration Data' attribute. "/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="BasicTabHelpText" ResourceString="More information"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="StringsTabCaption" ResourceString="Localization"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="StringsTabHelpText" ResourceString="More information"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="StringsTabDescription" ResourceString="The user interface strings for most items in the RCDC are automatically determined by the schema. "/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="StringsTabCaption" ResourceString="Localization"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="StringsTabDescription" ResourceString="The user interface strings for most items in the RCDC are automatically determined by the schema. However, for items that are not found in the schema, resource strings must be specified in the 'String Resources' attribute. It checks if there is a match between the browser's preferred locale and the available locales for the String Resources attribute on the RCDC corresponding to the resource being edited. If no value of this attribute is specified for a given language, the values for the Neutral language are be used."/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="StringResouresDescription" ResourceString="To view the string resources for a given language, select the language below and then choose the desired option."/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="SupportedLanguages" ResourceString="Language"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="Neutral" ResourceString="Neutral"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="NeutralLanguage" ResourceString="Neutral Language"/> </SymbolResourcePairs>

<SymbolResourcePair Symbol="DependencyDropdownDescription" ResourceString="Dependency is a Synchronization Rule that must be applied before this Synchronization Rule can be applied."/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="FlowTypeCaption" ResourceString="Data Flow Direction"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="FlowTypeDescription" ResourceString="Data Flow Direction indicates the direction of attribute flow for this Synchronization Rule."/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="ScopeTabCaption" ResourceString="Scope"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="ScopeTabHelpText" ResourceString="More information"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="ILMObjectTypeCaption" ResourceString="Metaverse Resource Type"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="ILMObjectTypeDescription" ResourceString="The resource type in the FIM Metaverse that this Synchronization Rule applies to."/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="ConnectedSystemCaption" ResourceString="External System"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="ConnectedSystemDescription" ResourceString="The external system this Synchronization Rule will operate on."/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="ConnectedObjectTypeCaption" ResourceString="External System Resource Type"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="ConnectedObjectTypeDescription" ResourceString="The resource type in the external system that this Synchronization Rule applies to."/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="ConnectedObjectScopeCaption" ResourceString="External System Scoping Filter"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="ConnectedObjectScopeDescription" ResourceString="Define a filter that identifies the resources in the external system to which this synchronization rule will be applied."/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="RelationshipTabCaption" ResourceString="Relationship"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="RelationshipTabHelpText" ResourceString="More information"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="RelationshipCriteriaCaption" ResourceString="Relationship Criteria"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="RelationshipCriteriaDescription" ResourceString="Relationship Criteria is a set of conditions that identify resources in FIM and resources in the External System that are related to each other."/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="CreateObjectInILMCaption" ResourceString="Create Resource In FIM"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="CreateObjectInILMDescription" ResourceString="If no resource in the FIM Metaverse satisfies the Relationship Criteria, a new resource will be created."/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="CreateObjectInILMValue" ResourceString="Create resource in FIM"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="CreateObjectInCSCaption" ResourceString="Create Resource in External System"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="CreateObjectInCSDescription" ResourceString="If no resource in the External system satisfies the Relationship Criteria, a new resource will be created."/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="CreateObjectInCSValue" ResourceString="Create resource in external system"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="RemoveObjectFromCSCaption" ResourceString="Enable Deprovisioning"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="RemoveObjectFromCSDescription" ResourceString="This option applies when this Synchronization Rule is removed from an resource in FIM."/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="RemoveObjectFromCSValue" ResourceString="Disconnect FIM resource from external system resource when this Synchronization Rule is removed."/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="ParametersTabCaption" ResourceString="Workflow Parameters"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="ParametersTabHelpText" ResourceString="More information"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="SyncruleParametersCaption" ResourceString="Workflow Parameters"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="SyncruleParametersDescription" ResourceString="Parameters receive their values from workflow activities. Parameter can be used to flow values provided from workflow to external resources"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="OutboundAttributeFlowGroupTabCaption" ResourceString="Outbound Attribute Flow"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="OutboundAttributeFlowGroupTabHelpText" ResourceString="More information"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="OutboundAttributeFlowCaption" ResourceString="Outbound Attribute Flow"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="OutboundAttributeFlowDescription" ResourceString="Specify the attributes and values to flow from Forefront Identity Manager to the external system"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="InboundAttributeFlowGroupTabCaption" ResourceString="Inbound Attribute Flow"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="InboundAttributeFlowGroupTabHelpText" ResourceString="More information"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="InboundAttributeFlowCaption" ResourceString="Inbound Attribute Flow"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="InboundAttributeFlowDescription" ResourceString="Specify the attributes and values to flow from the external system to Forefront Identity Manager"/> <SymbolResourcePair Symbol="GroupingSummaryTabCaption" ResourceString="Summary"/> </SymbolResourcePairs>
